>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/favorites"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds files and folders with the IDs specified in the request to the favorite list.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"returnSingleOperation":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to return only the current operation","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The base operation request parameters.","title":"FileOperationRequestBaseDto"},{"type":"object","properties":{"folderIds":{"type":"array","items":{"anyOf":[{"type":"integer","example":1234},{"type":"string","example":"some text"}]},"description":"The list of folder IDs of the base batch request.","nullable":true},"fileIds":{"type":"array","items":{"anyOf":[{"type":"integer","example":1234},{"type":"string","example":"some text"}]},"description":"The list of file IDs of the base batch request.","nullable":true}}}],"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The base batch request parameters.","title":"BaseBatchRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
